description: Building calculation logics for carbon accounting and product carbon footprint for companies in Steel, Chemicals, Manufacturing, Oil and Gas sectors
highlights: Worked on a calculator to compute a product's carbon footprint
Optimized queries to reduce the computation time for product carbon footprint by 50% and 30% for Carbon Accounting
Contributed to a feature to visualize a facility's production line
Worked on a calculator to compute a facility's carbon footprint for a month
Contributed to the design of multi-tenant database for the B2B SaaS product
Contributed to storage and searching of various emission factor databases to be used to compute carbon emissions
Contributed to the data ingestion pipeline via excel and S3

description: Managing game and tournament logics for online poker
highlights: Developed features like hand-for-hand, re-entry to improve online poker tournament experiences
Developed a poker simulator that was integrated with poker learning courses
